message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - This paper focuses on Natural Language Processing (NLP) using Deep Learning methods, which falls under the scope of cs.CL.
2. cs.SD (Sound) - The paper discusses signal processing techniques for speech-to-text conversion, which falls under the scope of cs.SD.
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - Deep Learning is a subfield of Machine Learning, and the paper specifically mentions the use of Deep Recurrent Neural Networks for speech-to-text conversion.
4. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - Deep Learning is a subfield of Artificial Intelligence, and the paper discusses the use of Deep Learning methods for NLP applications.
5. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper discusses the development of a speech-to-text system, which falls under the scope of cs.SY.
